mapper.sql: production_station_class_id AS "productionStationClassId", production_station_id AS "productionStationId", user_id AS "userId", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from production_station_class where 1 = 1
and production_station_class_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.productionStationClassId},'%')
and production_station_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.productionStationId},'%')
and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userId},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
